name: music_of_gravity
prompt: Astronomers detect melodies in gravitational waves. Write a concert review of the universe’s first performance.
decoded: The universe's first performance was a symphony of cosmic melodies, where gravitational waves played the notes of the Big Bang. The concert was a celebration of the universe's birth, with each note representing the expansion and contraction of space. It was a moment of profound beauty, where the cosmos came together in perfect harmony.
